name: Minh Anh Vo
about:
Specializing in recruiting mid to senior level positions in Tech, Social Media and Digital realms.
Domains: AdTech, MarTech, EdTech, FinTech, HealthTech, PropTech, Ecommerce, E-logistic, digital transformation.
Aim at bringing value to both employers and employee in terms of recruitment analytics and opportunity delivery.
Contact me via email: minhanh.vo@adecco.com

experiences.description:
Specializing in recruiting mid to senior level positions in digital transformation, digital solutions and platforms of MarTech, AdTech, EduTech, E-commerce Tech; Technology Sales (software distribution, hi-tech devices, SaaS tech product, etc.)
